Package me.tatarka.ipromise

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CancelToken.Listener
    The listener to be notified when a token is canceled.
    Promise.Chain<A,B,ER extends java.lang.Exception,E extends ER>
    Chains the result of one Promise to second Promise.
    Promise.Listener<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>
    A listener for receiving the result of a promise.
    Promise.Map<A,B>
    Maps the result of one Promise to the result of another Promise
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CancelToken
    A CancelToken is used to propagate cancellation of a Promise.
    Deferred<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>
    A Deferred is the producer end of a Promise.
    Promise<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>
    A promise is a way to return a result the will be fulfilled sometime in the future.
    Promise.Adapter<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>
    This adapter is useful for when you only care about some of the possible result states or you want to split out the possible result states in separate methods.
    Result<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>
    An immutable result from a promise.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Promise.AlreadyDeliveredException
    The Exception thrown if a result has already been delivered and a second result is attempted to be delivered.
    Result.CanceledException
    The exception thrown when a result is canceled.
